Package game.weapons.portableweapons

Class Scimitar

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.weapons.weapontypes.CurvedSword
game.weapons.portableweapons.Scimitar
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Weapon, Purchasable, Sellable
public class Scimitar extends CurvedSword implements Purchasable, Sellable
A weapon that is carried by the Skeletal Bandit. It deals 118 damage with 88% attack accuracy. Created by:
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Che'er Min Yi, Chong Ming Sheng, Lam Xin Yuan

    • tick

      public void tick(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      Performs an action on each tick of the game loop. Checks if the Scimitar is ready to be sold and if there is an actor nearby with the capability to provide a sell service. Adds a sell action to the Scimitar if the conditions are met and removes the "READY_TO_BE_SOLD" capability.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - the location of the actor carrying this item
      actor - the actor carrying this item
      See Also:
      • Status.READY_TO_BE_SOLD
      • Status.PROVIDE_SELL_SERVICE
      • SurroundingChecker.surroundingHasActorWithCapability(Location, Status)

    • getDropAction

      public DropAction getDropAction(Actor actor)
      Removes SellAction from weapon allowableActions.Create and return an action to drop this WeaponItem. If this WeaponItem is not portable, returns null.
      Overrides:
      getDropAction in class WeaponItem
      Parameters:
      actor - actor that performs drop action
      Returns:
      a new DropWeaponAction if this WeaponItem is portable, null otherwise.
